content:
Set Up Automated Notifications in Service Cloud Messaging

Send automated messages to customers in Messaging channels based on certain events, such as notifying about the status of their case: “John, your case #1234 has been resolved.” You can use automated messaging—also known as triggered outbound messaging—in standard Messaging channels, enhanced WhatsApp channels, enhanced Apple Messages for Business channels, Messaging for In-App, and Bring Your Own Channel messaging channels.

The way you set up and send an automated notification depends on the channel where it’s sent.

To send automated messages in:
Standard WhatsApp channels: Submit a template to Salesforce for review by WhatsApp. Then, create the approved template on the Messaging templates page in Setup.
Standard SMS and standard Facebook Messenger channels: Create a template on the Messaging Templates page in Setup.
Enhanced WhatsApp channels: Create a template in WhatsApp Business Manager. Then, create a notification messaging component on the Messaging Components page in Setup, and link it to your template.
Messaging for In-App, enhanced SMS, and enhanced Apple Messages for Business channels: Create a notification messaging component on the Messaging Components page in Setup.

In some channels, automated messages are only supported within the country of the channel’s phone number. For example, in a channel with a US phone number (+1), you can send automatic messages only to US phone numbers.

You can also set up push notifications for your iOS or Android mobile apps in your Messaging for In-App channel.

Send Automated Messages in Enhanced and Standard Messaging Channels
Using a flow and a notification messaging component, send customers automated messages in enhanced WhatsApp, enhanced SMS, enhanced Apple Messages for Business, Messaging for In-App, or Bring Your Own Channel messaging channels to notify them about a product delivery, case update, or something else.
Using a flow, send customers automated, template-based messages in standard Messaging channels to notify them about a product delivery, case update, or something else.
title: Setting Up Automated Notifications in Service Cloud
